name: HoverRace 2
description:
A short prototype for a racing game I was working on. Technically a spiritual successor to the original game (just called HoverRace) by GrokkSoft. 

Shift to activate thrust

Hold S to slow down

R to reset back to the track if you fall off

Would love to hear any and all feedback, especially if you think you'd enjoy the full game! (It would include multiplayer, and have AI races, etc.)

Thanks and hope you enjoy!
